Translations.Text: Tazmamt, feuulen issekniyen is; Leqwoan s taaoabt, i ugdud issnen
ipbeccioen, ineddoen. Tegwti degsen numren, d$a ur sellen
Nnan: "ulawen nne$ ddurin i wayen i$eo la $ tneccdev; di tmejjin nne$: tiaeegt; garane$ yidek: sieo. Ihi, exdem, nekwni la nxeddem
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d kan ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Sweqmet $uoeS, ssutret aS ssmae". A tawa$it n imcurak
wid ur nepzekki, u nitni nekoen laxeot
Ih, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan: arraz ur nepnegzay
Ini: "kunwi aql akwen la tnekoem Win Ixelqen tamurt, di sin wussan. La S tepparam nned. Wagi d Mass imavalen
Irra degs idurar sufella. Ioqa p, Iwzen degs tagwella s, di kue wussan. Akka i wid isteqsayen
Sinna, Izzi ar igenni i illan d abbu. Inna yas, u i tmurt: "aset ed, teb$am ne$ tugim"! Nnan: "a n nas, d imvuaen
